summary: This mod enhances the Bloodskal Blade.
descriptionHtml:
This mod enhances the Bloodskal Blade added to the game via the Dragonborn DLC. The mod increases the swing speed of the blade, increases the energy blast\\\'s damage to 40 and adds the stagger effect to the energy blast. 

*Requires Dragonborn DLC*
author: Neilman30
